verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w lime|strong="H7875"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Edom,

\w to|strong="H4191"\w* desecrate \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H6963"\w* \w will|strong="H4124"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire into \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. \w It|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H4124"\w* devour \w the|strong="H7971"\w* palaces \w of|strong="H6963"\w* Kirioth, \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* war-cry, \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ruler|strong="H8269"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* nobles \w I|strong="H3772"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w*, says \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H8104"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w false|strong="H3577"\w* \w gods|strong="H1980"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* ancestors \w followed|strong="H1980"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w led|strong="H1980"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w astray|strong="H8582"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w It|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3063"\w* devour \w the|strong="H7971"\w* palaces \w of|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. God’s Judgment on Israel

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w crimes|strong="H6588"\w* – \w no|strong="H3808"\w*, \w four|strong="H7969"\w*! – \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rescind \w my|strong="H3068"\w* judgment. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* needy \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pair \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w shoes|strong="H5275"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w trample|strong="H7602"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w push|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w humble|strong="H6035"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. Father \w and|strong="H3212"\w* son \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w same|strong="H8034"\w* temple \w girl|strong="H5291"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* garments \w taken|strong="H2254"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w pledges|strong="H2254"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w fined|strong="H6064"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Amorites \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* sake, whose \w height|strong="H1363"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* cedars, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w strong|strong="H2634"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* oaks. \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w below|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5927"\w* \w was|strong="H8141"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w who|strong="H4057"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* land \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* here \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* land \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* Amorites.

\w I|strong="H6965"\w* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w youths|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nazirites|strong="H5139"\w*. \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3068"\w* \w so|strong="H6965"\w*, \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*? \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w made|strong="H8248"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nazirites|strong="H5139"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H3196"\w* banned \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w*.

\w Listen|strong="H2009"\w*! \w It|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* who will make \w you|strong="H8478"\w* groan \w in|strong="H8478"\w* \w your|strong="H8478"\w* \w places|strong="H8478"\w*, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wagon|strong="H5699"\w* groans \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w its|strong="H8478"\w* load \w of|strong="H8478"\w* grain.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w flight|strong="H4498"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w fail|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w strongest|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w useless|strong="H3808"\w*. \w The|strong="H3808"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5975"\w* archer \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w firm|strong="H5975"\w*, \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*, \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w horseman|strong="H7392"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w save|strong="H4422"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5002"\w* bravest \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
